title: Civil Daily Cause List
heading: Civil Daily Cause List
importantInformationLine1: Central London County Court and Mayors & City of London Court â€“ Hearings for the County Court at Central London will be heard at the Thomas More Building, located in the Royal Courts of Justice. Cases are also listed at Mayors & City of London Court, Guildhall Buildings, Basinghall Street, London, EC2V 5AR. Due to judicial availability, cases may be moved between the County Court at Central London and Mayors & City of London Court. Please ensure you check the cause lists for Central London County Court and Mayors and City of London Court the day prior to your hearing. Lists aim to be published by 1700.
importantInformationLine2: Requests for the media and others, including legal bloggers, should be made to County Court at Central London via enquiries.centrallondon.countycourt@justice.gov.uk or Mayors and City of London Court via enquiries.centrallondon.countycourt@justice.gov.uk. Arrangements will then be made for you to attend. When considering the use of telephone and video technology the judiciary will have regard to the principles of open justice. The Court may exclude observers where necessary to secure the proper administration of Justice.
